rep.text: It's so interesting to see a Na'Hum. You are not here to harm our village, are you?
No, why would you think so?
They say your people consider killing other animals a game. And aren't we all animals?
Some even say you put their skins or heads on walls to brag about.
Well... That is some of our traditions, yes... We are predators and predators hunt their prey...
And you are humans, as long as I can see... Humans aren't animals!
Us, Ju'Ji aren't predators, we grow our food and live in peace with others...
People in my world can't agree about that either...
As for food... It's quite easy to achieve this with your climate...
